alert.note: Alert for Loess Plains (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 12 at 3:11AM CDT until October 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low humidity, which is in effect from Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 219 Loess Plains. * TIMING...Thursday afternoon and evening. * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 60s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
